td.content: s:62 yo white F presents with Respiratory. she has history of moderate shortness of breath. she denies smoking she is a chronic alcoholic o:Height 153 cm, Weight 62.5 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN via non-rebreather mask, and ordered Arterial Blood Gas, duplex US of leg.

Value.Value: ordered Arterial Blood Gas , duplex US of leg

content2.Value: ordered Arterial Blood Gas , duplex US of leg

td.content: s:63 YO white female anchorman presents with chronic moderate shortness of breath. o:Height 153 cm, Weight 62.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.

s:white f anchorman aged 63 yrs presents with moderate shortness of breath for about 10 days. o:Height 153 cm, Weight 63 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Arterial Blood Gas, duplex US of leg.
